member.summary: Video content.

member.summary: Component representing a video.

remarks.para: Associate this component to an entity to render a video into a texture.

member.name: P:Xenko.Video.VideoComponent.Source
member.summary: The source video.
member.userdoc: The video asset used as a source.

member.name: P:Xenko.Video.VideoComponent.Target
member.summary: The target texture where frames from the video will be rendered.
member.userdoc: A texture used as target from rendering the frames of the video.

member.name: P:Xenko.Video.VideoComponent.LoopVideo
member.summary: If activated, the video will automatically restart when reaching the end
member.userdoc: If activated, the video will automatically restart when reaching the end

member.name: P:Xenko.Video.VideoComponent.MaxMipMapCount
member.summary: Defines the maximum number of mip maps that will be generated for the video texture.
member.userdoc: The maximum number of mip maps to generate for the video texture.

member.name: P:Xenko.Video.VideoComponent.PlayAudio
member.summary: If activated, the video's audio track will be played
member.userdoc: If activated, the video's audio track will be played

member.summary: The list of audioEmitteur components.

member.name: P:Xenko.Video.VideoInstance.Duration
member.summary: The duration of the video.

member.name: P:Xenko.Video.VideoInstance.PlayState
member.summary: The current state of the video.

member.name: P:Xenko.Video.VideoInstance.SpeedFactor
member.summary: Applies a speed factor the to the video playback. The default value is 1.0f.

member.name: P:Xenko.Video.VideoInstance.IsLooping
member.summary: Define if the video loop or not after reaching the end of the range

member.name: P:Xenko.Video.VideoInstance.LoopRange
member.summary: if Loop is set to true: set the time at which we restart the video when we arrive at LoopRangeEnd

member.name: P:Xenko.Video.VideoInstance.Volume
member.summary: The global volume at which the sound is played.
member.remarks: Volume is ranging from 0.0f (silence) to 1.0f (full volume). Values beyond those limits are clamped.

member.name: M:Xenko.Video.VideoInstance.Release
member.summary: Release the VideoInstance

member.name: M:Xenko.Video.VideoInstance.Play
member.summary: Plays or resumes the video.
member.remarks: If the video was stopped, plays from the beginning. If the video was paused, resumes playing. If the video is already playing, this method does nothing.

member.name: M:Xenko.Video.VideoInstance.Pause
member.summary: Pauses the video.

member.name: M:Xenko.Video.VideoInstance.Seek(System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Seeks the video to the provided .

member.name: M:Xenko.Video.VideoInstance.RestartVideo
member.summary: Restarts the video from the beginning.

member.name: M:Xenko.Video.VideoInstance.Stop
member.summary: Stops the video.
member.remarks: The resources used by the video are also released.

member.name: M:Xenko.Video.VideoInstance.Update(System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Advances the play time to the provided time.

member.name: M:Xenko.Video.VideoInstance.OnPlaybackCallback(SharpDX.MediaFoundation.MediaEngineEvent,System.Int64,System.Int32)
member.summary: Called when [playback callback].

member.summary: Swap the mip mapped video texture with the one supplied. This way all references stay intact but the contents of the texture change.

member.name: T:Xenko.XenkoVersion
member.summary: Internal version used to identify Xenko version.
member.remarks: Note: Xenko.xkpkg and PublicVersion versions should match. Also, during package build, PackageUpdateVersionTask is updating that file and expect some specific text regex so be careful if you change any of this.

member.name: F:Xenko.XenkoVersion.PublicVersion
member.summary: The version used by editor for display purpose. 4th digit needs to be at least 1 if used (due to NuGet special cases).

member.name: F:Xenko.XenkoVersion.AssemblyVersion
member.summary: The current assembly version as text, currently same as .

member.name: F:Xenko.XenkoVersion.NuGetVersionSimple
member.summary: The NuGet package version without special tags.

member.name: F:Xenko.XenkoVersion.NuGetVersion
member.summary: The NuGet package version.

member.name: F:Xenko.XenkoVersion.NuGetVersionSuffix
member.summary: The NuGet package suffix (i.e. -beta01). Note: might be replaced during package build.

member.name: F:Xenko.XenkoVersion.AssemblyInformationalVersion
member.summary: The informational assembly version, containing -dev or -g[git_hash] during package.

member.name: F:Xenko.XenkoVersion.AssemblyInformationalSuffix
member.summary: The assembly suffix. Note: replaced by git commit during package build.
